name: Kaos
detailed_description:
If you are looking for a game that isn't the same-ol-same-ol... Looking for something that has many things to discover (worthwhile things)... Looking for a game with depth... Looking for something that you've never played before...

Based on Third-person/Top down shooter that doesn't take itself too seriously (it is a game after all).
  • Configurable and upgradable armaments.
  • Conversations and choices will affect the game.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Sorry, but there isn't a nanny pointer to direct your next action.
  • Camera can be locked or unlocked at will.
  • Hi-def is native resolution.
  • Potentially, emotionally charged moments.
  • NPC's have been directed to not speak "AT" you, please report violations of this and we will investigate.

Just as a starting (I don't want to spoil it) clue... the first part can be done in 10 minutes (no special gaming skills required).

short_description: Unique third-person/Top down shooter (changable), humor injected everywhere, has elements of other game types (rps, sandbox, arcade, TD) with emphasis on the "fun factor". Players of all levels of expertise will be challenged, each player, no matter what their gamespertise is, will be able to reach all goals, it's only a matter...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Settings options allow reduced demands on the hardware.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains mild extreme gore.  Conversational topics may be offensive.
